title: Messages rendering performance
body:
js thread with times on Android 6.0 device (6cpu1.8)
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/11790366/110433242-7c1ff280-80b0-11eb-9069-a14c8537fd6f.png)

As you can see there are 3 major parts we could improve
1) use js data (don't use js->clj)
2) improve dates preparation (probably move to status-go)
3) and most important improve items layout, if we use simple text component in the renderer, time drops to 20ms from 500ms
this is just an experiment with removing parts of renderer, you can see that each component adds complexity and we need to simplify the entire renderer we can't just simplify one component or part
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/11790366/110434177-c5247680-80b1-11eb-8029-43e14fd18eaa.png)

receiving one new message

Moving this to a discussion, good to re-evaluate once development settles a bit
